unit_rules.name: The Lord Solar
unit_rules.text: At the start of the Battle Round, gain 1 CP.

unit_rules.name: The Collegiate Astrolex
unit_rules.text: After both players have deployed their armies, select up to three +Astra Militarum+ units from your army and redeploy them. Selected units may alternatively be placed into Reserves.

unit_rules.name: Orders
unit_rules.text: This +Officer+ can issue up to 3 Orders to +Astra Militarum+ units.
